item.title: Steven Strogatz ask me anything video
item.description: This is a follow up from the previous post. I have stumbled upon a wonderful recent video by Steven Strogatz on Twitter which I believe could be extremely helpful for current and prospective PhD students in STEM, and for their advisors! I think it is worth every minute of it: Consider also listening to Strogatz' The Joy of x podcast, it gives a beautiful, humane and informative snapshot into what research and researchers are like.

item.title: On doing a PhD (in STEM)
item.description: I was asked a few times in the recent past if doing a PhD is worth the effort. Since then, I have been thinking of writing what I think on my blog but, as usual, I could never find the time for it. Not long ago, Jacopo Bertolotti shared his thoughts on the same matter in a nice twitter thread. Since that really resonated with what I had to say, I’ll let him speak also for me and add a few more comments at the end.
